body_html:
It seems the current tensorflow build referenced from https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows actually requires CuDNN 6.0 instead of CuDNN 5.1 as the text specifies.

Apparently the installation instructions are out of sync with the install package.
body_text:
It seems the current tensorflow build referenced from https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows actually requires CuDNN 6.0 instead of CuDNN 5.1 as the text specifies.
Apparently the installation instructions are out of sync with the install package.
body:
It seems the current tensorflow build referenced from https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows actually requires CuDNN 6.0 instead of CuDNN 5.1 as the text specifies.

Apparently the installation instructions are out of sync with the install package.
